name: Bug Bite
description: You lash out and bite a target. Make a melee attack against a creature, dealing 1d10 + MOVE bug damage on a hit. If the target is holding a berry when you hit, you immediately eat it and gain its effect.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.
